messages.title: BREXIT IS CAUSING PRICES TO RISE
Back Jon Nicholas for an MP who will:
messages.content:
1. Protect our NHS
2. Fight hard Brexit
3. Boost school funding

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Jon will defend our NHS and stop further Conservative cuts. With waiting lists at record levels and hospitals stretched to breaking point, the Lib Dems will raise an extra £6 billion each year to properly fund health and social care.

Jon is fighting Conservative plans for a hard Brexit. Bournemouth's major employers including the financial sector, language schools, universities and tourist trade rely heavily on our trade with Europe for its prosperity.

The Tories aren't giving local schools the money they need. The Lib Dems are campaigning for schools in Bournemouth to be provided with an extra £26 million, ensuring they can continue to give high quality education for local children.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jon Nicholas is the Liberal Democrat candidate for Bournemouth East. Jon's work takes him all over the constituency and beyond to schools and community projects. He works on a wide range of inclusion projects which have given him powerful insight into some of the most vulnerable people and communities locally and beyond.

images.caption: Jon Nicholas will fight for Bournemouth

leaflet.additionalNotes: We have an important choice on June 8th. Choose a strong local champion who will campaign for jobs.
